title: Northgate Crossing lease takeover
posting_body: Looking for someone to take over my lease for my 1 bed 1 bath apartment at Northgate Crossing, conveniently located in Wheeling, right across from Wheeling Town Center, since I am relocating for work.
Available starting 8/24/22 and lease ends 2/13/23, but you can renew if needed.
Monthly rent is $1605 (cheaper than going through the leasing office - they are asking for $1855).
Please feel free message me if interested or if you have further questions!
We can do pro-rated rent if needed based on your specific move in date, so let me know.
I've also got furniture I can sell for cheap if needed.
